summary: An Ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of a public street and highway to be known as Wilson Avenue, from the intersection of Dawson Street and Fifty-first Avenue South to the intersection of Hudson Street and Fiftieth Avenue South, the changing and establishing of the curb grades of said avenue, and for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, as provided for in Ordinance No. 37397, of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district to pay therefor.
